attributes.additional_details: I was abused & the law failed me time has come for a change I'm not the only person trouble is by time children know what happen there to scare to report then like myself a lot report it in adult but then it's word against word then when in court it all became about how people in my life suppose did credit theft to my abusers & not the fact years on I'm still struggling & fear for other children the law state if under 13 it's statuary rape yet they didn't even try n charge them with this they had over 10 charter witness I only had my sister n mum my sister boyfriend got drop as a witness there are so many adult that here to much about them getting away that they don't speak out the law states that crimes that are not being taken in that court n not relevant not allowed to be brought into that court how is things like the mum committed tax credit theft n credit card theft related yet one of the to offenders who got found not guilty admitted to touching my breast at the age of 12.
